Text.Page:
In order to keep the initiative, I'm sending you out to cull the argons.

Kill kallan reavers, kalash protectors, defenders, and brutes, yusul slashers, and zariik cyanowitches and cyclopses.

Report to Ayva in Kanstria when you've completed the mission.
I'm glad we've got soldiers like you, <PCNAME>. Well done.
You haven't achieved your objectives yet. Sorry.
